Author: Eugene Zhlobo
Message:
Allow spread operator in attributes - N.B. for jsx transform only (#3152)

Currently we only support spread attributes in the transform for producing jsx. Although this adds support for them at the lexer level, they will just be blindly included in the output html when using the standard pug instance. In the future we may introduce proper spread properties to pug as well.

Author: Marcelo Lopes Lotufo
Message:
Trailing semicolon (#2962)

* Only put trailing semicolon when merging style attributes

This is a first draft that tries to maintain the same code behavior
without worrying too much about the code quality

* Update tests so they reflect the new code behavior

All style attributes that received a String won't generate
a trailing semicolon

* Improve merge trailing semicolon code

Check if String is not empty by checking if it its true ('' is false)
Get last character of the string using slice(-1)
Add semicolon if the last string character is not a semicolon

* Use array style indexing instead of `.slice` to get last character

Author: Andrew Bradley
Message:
Fixes #2774: "shadowed" blocks can be properly replaced / appended / prepended (#2793)

* Normalize line endings on Windows

* Adds failing test for replacing shadowed blocks

* Fixes #2774: shadowed blocks in 3+-level layout heirarchies can be replaced/appended/prepended

Updates snapshots for new shadowed block behavior.  When a block is
shadowed in an extending layout, node replacement / appending /
prepending is applied to the shadower block in addition to the parent,
shadowed block.  This change is reflected in the snapshots.

Author: Forbes Lindesay
Message:
Monorepo (#2676)

* User lerna

* Import all the packages

* Delete test output

* Fix test cases

[closes #2605]

* Convert all the tests to jest

This lets us generate one set of coverage for use in coveralls.  It
also lets us use jest’s awesome watch mode across all the different
packages.

* Remove unnecessary dot files

The root .gitignore and .travis.yml take care of very nearly everything
anyway.

* Attempt to fix broken permissions

* Add a README for the root directory.

This cuts down node_modules from 90M deduped to 28M.

browser is exactly the same as using Pug in Node.js. This allows us to
get rid of the Express.js dependency.

Message:
Pass through filterOptions to handleFilters

This allows the user to set default options for filters (e.g. default

Author: ForbesLindesay
Message:
Accept filters as an option rather than defined on exports

This will fix the fairly common issue where people add a custom filter
to one version of pug but then use a different version to do the
rendering (via something like a gulp/grunt plugin).
